role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Multipass on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [Multipass](https://multipass.run/) makes it so that you can get an instant Ubuntu VM with a single command. Multipass can launch and run virtual machines and configure them with cloud-init like a public cloud. It is a product of [Canonical](https://canonical.com/), the same company that publishes Ubuntu.
